title: Authors and Citation
text: Sigve Nakken. Author, maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Nakken S (2022). geneOncoX: Human gene annotations oncology domain. https://github.com/sigven/geneOncoX, https://sigven.github.io/geneOncoX/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {geneOncoX: Human gene annotations for the oncology domain},   author = {Sigve Nakken},   year = {2022},   note = {https://github.com/sigven/geneOncoX, https://sigven.github.io/geneOncoX/}, }

what: Human gene annotations for the oncology domain
title: Human gene annotations for the oncology domain
text: goal geneOncoX offer R package simplifies process gene annotation cancer sequencing projects. package offers pre-processed datasets, along metadata, user can retrieve use projects set-ups. package utilizes googledrive R package download pre-processed documented datasets local cache directory provided user. geneOncoX integrates number existing resources comes cancer-relevant gene annotations, including, limited : IntOGen - compendium mutational cancer driver genes Network Cancer Genes - collection curated cancer genes CancerMine - text-mined predictions tumor suppressor genes, proto-oncogenes cancer drivers Cancer Gene Census - manually curated resource cancer genes (soma germline) DNA repair genes - collection genes involved DNA repair Genomics England PanelApp - collections cancer gene panels used clinical diagnostics

title: Human gene annotations for the oncology domain
text: remotes::install_github('sigven/geneOncoX')

title: Human gene annotations for the oncology domain
text: package offers (currently) five different functions, retrieves specific dataset can use gene annotation purposes. get_basic() - retrieves basic, non-transcript-specific gene annotations. Includes tumor suppressor gene/oncogene/driver annotations multiple resources, NCBI gene summary descriptions, well multiple predictions/scores comes gene indispensability loss--function tolerance get_gencode() - retrieves two datasets ( grch37 grch38 ) human gene transcripts GENCODE, including cross-references RefSeq, UniProt, APPRIS, MANE get_alias() - retrieves list gene synonyms, indicating synonyms ambiguous nonambiguous (respect primary gene symbols) get_predisposition() - retrieves list genes relevance cancer predisposition, utilizing multiple resources, including Cancer Gene Census, Genomics England PanelApp, TCGA’s PanCancer study, others. get_panels() - retrieves collection > 40 different panels various cancer conditions, found Genomics England PanelApp Technically, dataset comes list object R metadata data frame lists URLs, citations, versions underlying resources records data frame contains actual gene/transcript annotations

title: Human gene annotations for the oncology domain
text: use datasets provided geneOncoX, make sure properly cite original publications resources integrated, .e.: IntOGen - Martínez-Jiménez et al., Nat Rev Cancer, 2020 CancerMine - Lever et al., Nat Methods, 2019 Network Cancer Genes - Repana et al., Genome Biol, 2019 Cancer Gene Census - Sondka et al., Nat Rev Cancer, 2018 DNA repair genes database - Woods et al., Science, 2001 dbNSFP - Liu et al., Genome Med, 2020 Genomics England PanelApp - Martin et al., Nat Genet, 2019 GENCODE - Frankish et al., Nucleic Acids Res, 2021

title: Human gene annotations for the oncology domain
text: sigven ifi.uio.

driver etc. based on multiple lines of evidence. — assign_cancer_gene_evidence

what: Get human gene aliases from NCBI — get_alias
title: Get human gene aliases from NCBI — get_alias
text: dataset indicate ambiguous unambiguous gene aliases/synonyms human genes. Gene aliases less three characters ignored, custom aliases added (source = custom). dataset comes list object, two elements: metadata - data frame metadata regarding annotation resources used records - list gene aliases indicating ambiguous/non-ambiguous state

title: Get human gene aliases from NCBI — get_alias
Get human gene aliases from NCBI — get_alias
text: cache_dir Local directory data download overwrite Logical indicating local cache overwritten (set TRUE re-download file exists cache)

title: Get human gene aliases from NCBI — get_alias
text: metadata - data frame 1 row 6 columns: source - gene annotation source annotation_data - type annotations used url - URL annotation resource citation - publication cite annotation source (citation; PMID) version - version used/datestamp abbreviation - abbreviation used column names records records - data frame 146,563 rows 5 columns: alias - gene alias/synonym symbol - primary symbol entrezgene - Entrez gene identifier n_primary_map - number primary symbols linked alias ambiguous - logical indicating alias ambiguous source - source gene synonyms (NCBI, custom)

what: Get basic cancer-relevant gene annotations — get_basic
title: Get basic cancer-relevant gene annotations — get_basic
text: Downloads returns dataset combines multiple human cancer gene annotations, .e. IntOGen, CancerMine, Network Cancer Genes, Cancer Gene Census, NCBI, dbNSFP etc. dataset comes list object, two elements: metadata - data frame metadata regarding annotation resources used records - data frame gene annotations (one record per gene)

title: Get basic cancer-relevant gene annotations — get_basic
Get basic cancer-relevant gene annotations — get_basic
text: cache_dir Local directory data download overwrite Logical indicating local cache overwritten (set TRUE re-download file exists cache)

title: Get basic cancer-relevant gene annotations — get_basic
text: metadata - data frame 10 rows 6 columns: source - gene annotation source annotation_data - type annotations used url - URL annotation resource citation - publication cite annotation source (citation; PMID) version - version used abbreviation - abbreviation used column names records records - data frame 77,496 rows 57 columns: entrezgene - NCBI Entrez identifier symbol - primary gene symbol gene_biotype - type gene (ncRNA, protein-coding, pseudo) name - gene name other_genename_designations - gene name designations hgnc_id - HGNC gene identifier ncbi_function_summary - gene function summary (NCBI Gene) cgc_tsg - tumor suppressor gene (Cancer Gene Census) cgc_oncogene - proto-oncogene (Cancer Gene Census) cgc_somatic - logical indicating whether cancer relevance gene relates soma (Cancer Gene Census) cgc_phenotype_somatic - cancer phenotypes relevant somatic mutations gene (Cancer Gene Census) cgc_germline - logical indicating whether cancer relevance gene relates germline (Cancer Gene Census) cgc_phenotype_germline - cancer phenotypes relevant germline mutations gene (Cancer Gene Census) ncg - cancer gene according Network Cancer Genes (NCG) ncg_tsg - tumor suppressor gene (NCG) ncg_oncogenei - proto-oncogene (NCG) ncg_phenotype - cancer phenotypes relevant gene (NCG) ncg_pmid - supporting literature identifiers (PMIDs, NCG) intogen_role - cancer driver role (IntOGen) intogen_phenotype - cancer phenotypes relevant gene (IntOGen) bailey2018_fp_driver - logical indicating whether gene likely false positive driver gene (Bailey et al., Cell, 2018) woods_dnarepair_class - class DNA repair (DNA repair database, Woods et al.) woods_dnarepair_activity - type DNA repair activity involved (DNA repair database, Woods et al.) illumina_tso500 - gene part Illumina's TSO500 panel (SNV_INDEL, CNA_GAIN, CNA_LOSS, RNA_FUSION) sanchezvega2018_signaling_pathway - curated signalling pathways (Sanchez-Vega et al., Cell, 2018) cancermine_pmid_driver - PMIDs support (text mining) role gene driver (CancerMine) cancermine_pmid_oncogene - PMIDs support (text mining) role gene proto-oncogene (CancerMine) cancermine_pmid_tsg - PMIDs support (text mining) role gene tumor suppressor gene (CancerMine) cancermine_doid_driver - cancer phenotypes relevant given role (Disease Ontology identifiers, CancerMine) cancermine_doid_oncogene - cancer phenotypes relevant given role (Disease Ontology identifiers, CancerMine) cancermine_doid_tsg - cancer phenotypes relevant given role (Disease Ontology identifiers, CancerMine) cancermine_n_cit_driver - number citations (PMIDs) support role driver (CancerMine) cancermine_n_cit_oncogene - number citations (PMIDs) support role proto-oncogene (CancerMine) cancermine_n_cit_tsg - number citations (PMIDs) support role tumor suppressor (CancerMine) cancermine_cit_tsg - citations cancer driver support (prob > 0.8, CancerMine) cancermine_cit_oncogene - citations proto-oncogene support (prob > 0.8, max 50, CancerMine) cancermine_cit_driver - citations tumor suppressor gene support (prob > 0.8, CancerMine) cancermine_cit_links_driver - citation links cancer driver support (50 recent, CancerMine) cancermine_cit_links_oncogene - citation links proto-oncogene support (50 recent, CancerMine) cancermine_cit_links_tsg - citation links tumor suppressor gene support (50 recent, CancerMine) mim_id - MIM gene id (HGNC) mim_phenotype_id - MIM (ids) phenotype gene caused associated (dbNSFP, Uniprot) prob_haploinsuffiency - Estimated probability haploinsufficiency gene (doi:10.1371/journal.pgen.1001154) (dbNSFP) gene_indispensability_score - probability prediction gene essential. doi:10.1371/journal.pcbi.1002886 (dbNSFP) gene_indispensability_pred - Essential ("E") loss--function tolerant ("N") based gene_indispensability_score (dbNSFP) essential_gene_crispr - Essential ("E") Non-essential phenotype-changing ("N") based large scale CRISPR experiments. doi: 10.1126/science.aac7041 (dbNSFP) essential_gene_crispr2 - Essential ("E"), context-Specific essential ("S"), Non-essential phenotype-changing ("N") based large scale CRISPR experiments. http://dx.doi.org/10.1016/j.cell.2015.11.015 (dbNSFP) prob_gnomad_lof_intolerant - probability loss--function intolerant (intolerant heterozygous homozygous lof variants) based gnomAD 2.1 data (dbNSFP) prob_gnomad_lof_intolerant_hom - probability intolerant homozygous, heterozygous lof variants based gnomAD 2.1 data (dbNSFP) prob_gnomad_lof_tolerant_null - probability tolerant heterozygous homozygous lof variants based gnomAD 2.1 data (dbNSFP) prob_exac_lof_intolerant - probability loss--function intolerant (intolerant heterozygous homozygous lof variants) based ExAC r0.3 data (dbNSFP) prob_exac_lof_intolerant_hom - probability intolerant homozygous, heterozygous lof variants based ExAC r0.3 data (dbNSFP) prob_exac_lof_tolerant_null - probability tolerant heterozygous homozygous lof variants based ExAC r0.3 data (dbNSFP) prob_exac_nontcga_lof_intolerant - probability loss--function intolerant (intolerant heterozygous homozygous lof variants) based ExAC r0.3 nonTCGA subset (dbNSFP) prob_exac_nontcga_lof_intolerant_hom - probability intolerant homozygous, heterozygous lof variants based ExAC 0.3 nonTCGA subset (dbNSFP) prob_exac_nontcga_lof_tolerant_null - probability tolerant heterozygous homozygous lof variants based ExAC r0.3 nonTCGA subset (dbNSFP) dbnsfp_function_description - gene function description (dbNSFP/UniProtKB)

what: Get human GENCODE transcript dataset — get_gencode
title: Get human GENCODE transcript dataset — get_gencode
text: Downloads returns pre-processed dataset GENCODE transcripts. dataset comes list object, two elements: metadata - data frame metadata regarding annotation resources used records - list two data frames transcripts, one grch37, one grch38 (see specific column format ) GENCODE datasets provided established parsing GENCODE comprehensive gene annotation GTF file valr package, also providing cross-references RefSeq (use biomaRt package), UniProt accessions/identifiers.

title: Get human GENCODE transcript dataset — get_gencode
Get human GENCODE transcript dataset — get_gencode
text: https://www.gencodegenes.org/ https://uniprot.org https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/gene https://apprisws.bioinfo.cnio.es/landing_page/

title: Get human GENCODE transcript dataset — get_gencode
text: cache_dir Local directory data download overwrite Logical indicating local cache overwritten (set TRUE re-download file exists cache)

title: Get human GENCODE transcript dataset — get_gencode
text: metadata - data frame 3 rows 6 columns: source - gene annotation source annotation_data - type annotations used url - URL annotation resource citation - publication cite annotation source (citation; PMID) version - version used abbreviation - abbreviation (e.g. used column names records) records - list one data frame per assembly chrom - chromosome start - transcript start 5kb padding (upstream) end - transcript end 5kb padding (downstream) transcript_start - transcript start transcript_end - transcript end strand - strand ensembl_gene_id - Ensembl gene identifier ensembl_transcript_id - Ensembl transcript identifier ensembl_transcript_id_full - Ensembl transcript identifier (version) ensembl_protein_id - Ensembl protein identifier symbol - official gene symbol hgnc_id - HGNC gene identifier entrezgene - Entrez gene identifier name - genename gene_biotype - gene biotype (GENCODE) transcript_biotype - transcript biotype (GENCODE)) tag - tag (GENCODE)) refseq_peptide - RefSeq peptide identifier refseq_mrna - RefSeq mRNA identifier mane_select - MANE Select mane_plus_clinical - MANE Plus Clinical principal_isoform_flag - Principal isoform tag (APPRIS) uniprot_acc - UniProtKB protein accession uniprot_id - UniProtKB protein identifier ensembl_version - Ensembl version gencode_version - GENCODE version uniprot_version - UniProtKB version

title: Cancer gene panel collections — get_panels
text: metadata - data frame 1 row 6 columns: source - gene annotation source annotation_data - type annotations used url - URL annotation resource citation - publication cite annotation source (citation; PMID) version - version used abbreviation - abbreviation used column names records records - data frame 2,566 rows 13 columns: genome_build - human assembly build (grch37/grch38) id - panel identifier (local) entrezgene - Entrez gene identifier genename - Gene name ensembl_gene_id - Ensembl gene identifier gepa_moi - mechanism inheritance (Genomics England PanelApp) gepa_penetrance - penetrance (Genomics England PanelApp) gepa_confidence_level - confidence level (Genomics England PanelApp) gepa_panel_name - panel name (Genomics England PanelApp) gepa_panel_id - panel identifier (Genomics England PanelApp) gepa_panel_version - panel version (Genomics England PanelApp) gepa_phenotype - associated cancer phenotypes (Genomics England PanelApp) gepa_panel_url - panel URL (Genomics England PanelApp)

title: Cancer gene panel collections — get_panels
text: NOTE: Gene panel records provided per genome build (filter column genome_build get build-specific set panels)

what: Get human cancer predisposition genes — get_predisposition
title: Get human cancer predisposition genes — get_predisposition
text: Downloads retrieves pre-processed dataset human cancer predisposition genes. Genes deemed relevant cancer predisposition collected multiple resources: Genomics England PanelApp TCGA's PanCancer study Cancer Gene Census Human DNA repair genes /curated dataset comes list object, two elements: metadata - data frame metadata regarding annotation resources used records - list records cancer predisposing gene, one record per gene

title: Get human cancer predisposition genes — get_predisposition
text: metadata - data frame 1 row 6 columns: source - gene annotation source annotation_data - type annotations used url - URL annotation resource citation - publication cite annotation source (citation; PMID) version - version used abbreviation - abbreviation used column names records records - data frame 591 rows 8 columns: symbol - official gene symbol entrezgene - Entrez gene identifier moi - mechanism inheritance (AD, AR) predisp_syndrome_cui - Concept unique identifiers (CUI, UMLS) - inherited cancer syndromes predisp_cancer_cui - Concept unique identifiers (CUI, UMLS) - inherited cancer conditions predisp_source - Sources cancer-predisposition gene PANEL_APP, CGC, TCGA_PANCAN_2018, , ACMG_SF phenotypes - associated cancer phenotypes mechanism_of_disease - mechanism disease)

title: Get human cancer predisposition genes — get_predisposition
